title: Icons + Emotes.
body:
I got this idea when I was half asleep and thought it mind be good.
You know how we have those CTRL 5-6 emotes now?

And when people had Team icons, the emotes would change to that teams banner?
Well Why dont we do the same for other Icons, Like.

Perfect Ascended Icon-
Or any shuriman Icon really.

Project Icons.
Pool Party Icons, 
That friendship Icon, I mean To fist slamming to together would be a cool emote.

Pentakill, 
Heck I think even some old ones would look cool.

replies.body: If you look in the control settings there's room for a lot more emotes (even a toggle), but for whatever reason they're going to be unused.
Yeah i'm actually really sad that they are removing the worlds icon active =(
Because nothing says BM more than boasting that you have more friends than me with the Friendship icon....{{champion:32}}
